00020 
00021   const Math::real AlbersEqualArea::eps_ = numeric_limits<real>::epsilon();
00022   const Math::real AlbersEqualArea::epsx_ = Math::sq(eps_);
00023   const Math::real AlbersEqualArea::epsx2_ = Math::sq(epsx_);
00024   const Math::real AlbersEqualArea::tol_ = sqrt(eps_);
00025   const Math::real AlbersEqualArea::tol0_ = tol_ * sqrt(sqrt(eps_));
00026   const Math::real AlbersEqualArea::ahypover_ =
00027     real(numeric_limits<real>::digits) * log(real(numeric_limits<real>::radix))
00028     + 2;
00029 
00030   AlbersEqualArea::AlbersEqualArea(real a, real r,
00031                                    real stdlat, real k0)
00032     : _a(a)
00033     , _r(r)
00034     , _f(_r != 0 ? 1 / _r : 0)
00035     , _fm(1 - _f)
00036     , _e2(_f * (2 - _f))
00037     , _e(sqrt(abs(_e2)))
00038     , _e2m(1 - _e2)
00039     , _qZ(1 + _e2m * atanhee(real(1)))
00040     , _qx(_qZ / ( 2 * _e2m ))
00041   {
00042     if (!(_a > 0))
00043       throw GeographicErr("Major radius is not positive");
00044     if (!(_f < 1))
00045       throw GeographicErr("Minor radius is not positive");
00046     if (!(k0 > 0))
00047       throw GeographicErr("Scale is not positive");
00048     if (!(abs(stdlat) <= 90))
00049       throw GeographicErr("Standard latitude not in [-90, 90]");
00050     real
00051       phi = stdlat * Math::degree<real>(),
00052       sphi = sin(phi),
00053       cphi = abs(stdlat) != 90 ? cos(phi) : 0;
00054     Init(sphi, cphi, sphi, cphi, k0);
00055   }
00056 
00057   AlbersEqualArea::AlbersEqualArea(real a, real r,
00058                                    real stdlat1, real stdlat2,
00059                                    real k1)
00060     : _a(a)
00061     , _r(r)
00062     , _f(_r != 0 ? 1 / _r : 0)
00063     , _fm(1 - _f)
00064     , _e2(_f * (2 - _f))
00065     , _e(sqrt(abs(_e2)))
00066     , _e2m(1 - _e2)
00067     , _qZ(1 + _e2m * atanhee(real(1)))
00068     , _qx(_qZ / ( 2 * _e2m ))
00069   {
00070     if (!(_a > 0))
00071       throw GeographicErr("Major radius is not positive");
00072     if (!(_f < 1))
00073       throw GeographicErr("Minor radius is not positive");
00074     if (!(k1 > 0))
00075       throw GeographicErr("Scale is not positive");
00076     if (!(abs(stdlat1) <= 90))
00077       throw GeographicErr("Standard latitude 1 not in [-90, 90]");
00078     if (!(abs(stdlat2) <= 90))
00079       throw GeographicErr("Standard latitude 2 not in [-90, 90]");
00080     real
00081       phi1 = stdlat1 * Math::degree<real>(),
00082       phi2 = stdlat2 * Math::degree<real>();
00083     Init(sin(phi1), abs(stdlat1) != 90 ? cos(phi1) : 0,
00084          sin(phi2), abs(stdlat2) != 90 ? cos(phi2) : 0, k1);
00085   }
00086 
00087   AlbersEqualArea::AlbersEqualArea(real a, real r,
00088                                                real sinlat1, real coslat1,
00089                                                real sinlat2, real coslat2,
00090                                                real k1)
00091     : _a(a)
00092     , _r(r)
00093     , _f(_r != 0 ? 1 / _r : 0)
00094     , _fm(1 - _f)
00095     , _e2(_f * (2 - _f))
00096     , _e(sqrt(abs(_e2)))
00097     , _e2m(1 - _e2)
00098     , _qZ(1 + _e2m * atanhee(real(1)))
00099     , _qx(_qZ / ( 2 * _e2m ))
00100   {
00101     if (!(_a > 0))
00102       throw GeographicErr("Major radius is not positive");
00103     if (!(_f < 1))
00104       throw GeographicErr("Minor radius is not positive");
00105     if (!(k1 > 0))
00106       throw GeographicErr("Scale is not positive");
00107     if (!(coslat1 >= 0))
00108       throw GeographicErr("Standard latitude 1 not in [-90, 90]");
00109     if (!(coslat2 >= 0))
00110       throw GeographicErr("Standard latitude 2 not in [-90, 90]");
00111     if (!(abs(sinlat1) <= 1 && coslat1 <= 1) || (coslat1 == 0 && sinlat1 == 0))
00112       throw GeographicErr("Bad sine/cosine of standard latitude 1");
00113     if (!(abs(sinlat2) <= 1 && coslat2 <= 1) || (coslat2 == 0 && sinlat2 == 0))
00114       throw GeographicErr("Bad sine/cosine of standard latitude 2");
00115     if (coslat1 == 0 && coslat2 == 0 && sinlat1 * sinlat2 <= 0)
00116       throw GeographicErr
00117         ("Standard latitudes cannot be opposite poles");
00118     Init(sinlat1, coslat1, sinlat2, coslat2, k1);
00119   }
00120 
00121   void AlbersEqualArea::Init(real sphi1, real cphi1,
00122                                    real sphi2, real cphi2, real k1) throw() {
00123     {
00124       real r;
00125       r = Math::hypot(sphi1, cphi1);
00126       sphi1 /= r; cphi1 /= r;
00127       r = Math::hypot(sphi2, cphi2);
00128       sphi2 /= r; cphi2 /= r;
00129     }
00130     bool polar = (cphi1 == 0);
00131     cphi1 = max(epsx_, cphi1);   // Avoid singularities at poles
00132     cphi2 = max(epsx_, cphi2);
00133     // Determine hemisphere of tangent latitude
00134     _sign = sphi1 + sphi2 >= 0 ? 1 : -1;
00135     // Internally work with tangent latitude positive
00136     sphi1 *= _sign; sphi2 *= _sign;
00137     if (sphi1 > sphi2) {
00138       swap(sphi1, sphi2); swap(cphi1, cphi2); // Make phi1 < phi2
00139     }
00140     real
00141       tphi1 = sphi1/cphi1, tphi2 = sphi2/cphi2;
00142 
00143     // q = (1-e^2)*(sphi/(1-e^2*sphi^2) - atanhee(sphi))
00144     // qZ = q(pi/2) = (1 + (1-e^2)*atanhee(1))
00145     // atanhee(x) = atanh(e*x)/e
00146     // q = sxi * qZ
00147     // dq/dphi = 2*(1-e^2)*cphi/(1-e^2*sphi^2)^2
00148     //
00149     // n = (m1^2-m2^2)/(q2-q1) -> sin(phi0) for phi1, phi2 -> phi0
00150     // C = m1^2 + n*q1 = (m1^2*q2-m2^2*q1)/(q2-q1)
00151     // let
00152     //   rho(pi/2)/rho(-pi/2) = (1-s)/(1+s)
00153     //   s = n*qZ/C
00154     //     = qZ * (m1^2-m2^2)/(m1^2*q2-m2^2*q1)
00155     //     = qZ * (scbet2^2 - scbet1^2)/(scbet2^2*q2 - scbet1^2*q1)
00156     //     = (scbet2^2 - scbet1^2)/(scbet2^2*sxi2 - scbet1^2*sxi1)
00157     //     = (tbet2^2 - tbet1^2)/(scbet2^2*sxi2 - scbet1^2*sxi1)
00158     // 1-s = -((1-sxi2)*scbet2^2 - (1-sxi1)*scbet1^2)/
00159     //         (scbet2^2*sxi2 - scbet1^2*sxi1)
00160     //
00161     // Define phi0 to give same value of s, i.e.,
00162     //  s = sphi0 * qZ / (m0^2 + sphi0*q0)
00163     //    = sphi0 * scbet0^2 / (1/qZ + sphi0 * scbet0^2 * sxi0)
00164 
00165     real tphi0, C;
00166     if (polar || tphi1 == tphi2) {
00167       tphi0 = tphi2;
00168       C = 1;                    // ignored
00169     } else {
00170       real
00171         tbet1 = _fm * tphi1, scbet12 = 1 + Math::sq(tbet1),
00172         tbet2 = _fm * tphi2, scbet22 = 1 + Math::sq(tbet2),
00173         txi1 = txif(tphi1), cxi1 = 1/hyp(txi1), sxi1 = txi1 * cxi1,
00174         txi2 = txif(tphi2), cxi2 = 1/hyp(txi2), sxi2 = txi2 * cxi2,
00175         dtbet2 = _fm * (tbet1 + tbet2),
00176         es1 = 1 - _e2 * Math::sq(sphi1), es2 = 1 - _e2 * Math::sq(sphi2),
00177         /*
00178         dsxi = ( (_e2 * sq(sphi2 + sphi1) + es2 + es1) / (2 * es2 * es1) +
00179                  Datanhee(sphi2, sphi1) ) * Dsn(tphi2, tphi1, sphi2, sphi1) /
00180         ( 2 * _qx ),
00181         */
00182         dsxi = ( (1 + _e2 * sphi1 * sphi2) / (es2 * es1) +
00183                  Datanhee(sphi2, sphi1) ) * Dsn(tphi2, tphi1, sphi2, sphi1) /
00184         ( 2 * _qx ),
00185         den = (sxi2 + sxi1) * dtbet2 + (scbet22 + scbet12) * dsxi,
00186         // s = (sq(tbet2) - sq(tbet1)) / (scbet22*sxi2 - scbet12*sxi1)
00187         s = 2 * dtbet2 / den,
00188         // 1-s = -(sq(scbet2)*(1-sxi2) - sq(scbet1)*(1-sxi1)) /
00189         //        (scbet22*sxi2 - scbet12*sxi1)
00190         // Write
00191         //   sq(scbet)*(1-sxi) = sq(scbet)*(1-sphi) * (1-sxi)/(1-sphi)
00192         sm1 = -Dsn(tphi2, tphi1, sphi2, sphi1) *
00193         ( -( ((sphi2 <= 0 ? (1 - sxi2) / (1 - sphi2) :
00194                Math::sq(cxi2/cphi2) * (1 + sphi2) / (1 + sxi2)) +
00195               (sphi1 <= 0 ? (1 - sxi1) / (1 - sphi1) :
00196                Math::sq(cxi1/cphi1) * (1 + sphi1) / (1 + sxi1))) ) *
00197           (1 + _e2 * (sphi1 + sphi2 + sphi1 * sphi2)) /
00198           (1 +       (sphi1 + sphi2 + sphi1 * sphi2)) +
00199           (scbet22 * (sphi2 <= 0 ? 1 - sphi2 : Math::sq(cphi2) / ( 1 + sphi2)) +
00200            scbet12 * (sphi1 <= 0 ? 1 - sphi1 : Math::sq(cphi1) / ( 1 + sphi1)))
00201           * (_e2 * (1 + sphi1 + sphi2 + _e2 * sphi1 * sphi2)/(es1 * es2)
00202           +_e2m * DDatanhee(sphi1, sphi2) ) / _qZ ) / den;
00203       // C = (scbet22*sxi2 - scbet12*sxi1) / (scbet22 * scbet12 * (sx2 - sx1))
00204       C = den / (2 * scbet12 * scbet22 * dsxi);
00205       tphi0 = (tphi2 + tphi1)/2;
00206       real stol = tol0_ * max(real(1), abs(tphi0));
00207       for (int i = 0; i < 2*numit0_; ++i) {
00208         // Solve (scbet0^2 * sphi0) / (1/qZ + scbet0^2 * sphi0 * sxi0) = s
00209         // for tphi0 by Newton's method on
00210         // v(tphi0) = (scbet0^2 * sphi0) - s * (1/qZ + scbet0^2 * sphi0 * sxi0)
00211         //          = 0
00212         // Alt:
00213         // (scbet0^2 * sphi0) / (1/qZ - scbet0^2 * sphi0 * (1-sxi0)) = s / (1-s)
00214         // w(tphi0) = (1-s) * (scbet0^2 * sphi0)
00215         //             - s  * (1/qZ - scbet0^2 * sphi0 * (1-sxi0))
00216         //          = (1-s) * (scbet0^2 * sphi0)
00217         //             - S/qZ  * (1 - scbet0^2 * sphi0 * (qZ-q0))
00218         // Now
00219         // qZ-q0 = (1+e2*sphi0)*(1-sphi0)/(1-e2*sphi0^2) +
00220         //         (1-e2)*atanhee((1-sphi0)/(1-e2*sphi0))
00221         // In limit sphi0 -> 1, qZ-q0 -> 2*(1-sphi0)/(1-e2), so wrte
00222         // qZ-q0 = 2*(1-sphi0)/(1-e2) + A + B
00223         // A = (1-sphi0)*( (1+e2*sphi0)/(1-e2*sphi0^2) - (1+e2)/(1-e2) )
00224         //   = -e2 *(1-sphi0)^2 * (2+(1+e2)*sphi0) / ((1-e2)*(1-e2*sphi0^2))
00225         // B = (1-e2)*atanhee((1-sphi0)/(1-e2*sphi0)) - (1-sphi0)
00226         //   = (1-sphi0)*(1-e2)/(1-e2*sphi0)*
00227         //     ((atanhee(x)/x-1) - e2*(1-sphi0)/(1-e2))
00228         // x = (1-sphi0)/(1-e2*sphi0), atanhee(x)/x = atanh(e*x)/(e*x)
00229         //
00230         // 1 - scbet0^2 * sphi0 * (qZ-q0)
00231         //   = 1 - scbet0^2 * sphi0 * (2*(1-sphi0)/(1-e2) + A + B)
00232         //   = D - scbet0^2 * sphi0 * (A + B)
00233         // D = 1 - scbet0^2 * sphi0 * 2*(1-sphi0)/(1-e2)
00234         //   = (1-sphi0)*(1-e2*(1+2*sphi0*(1+sphi0)))/((1-e2)*(1+sphi0))
00235         // dD/dsphi0 = -2*(1-e2*sphi0^2*(2*sphi0+3))/((1-e2)*(1+sphi0)^2)
00236         // d(A+B)/dsphi0 = 2*(1-sphi0^2)*e2*(2-e2*(1+sphi0^2))/
00237         //                 ((1-e2)*(1-e2*sphi0^2)^2)
00238 
00239         real
00240           scphi02 = 1 + Math::sq(tphi0), scphi0 = sqrt(scphi02),
00241           // sphi0m = 1-sin(phi0) = 1/( sec(phi0) * (tan(phi0) + sec(phi0)) )
00242           sphi0 = tphi0 / scphi0, sphi0m = 1/(scphi0 * (tphi0 + scphi0)),
00243           // scbet0^2 * sphi0
00244           g = (1 + Math::sq( _fm * tphi0 )) * sphi0,
00245           // dg/dsphi0 = dg/dtphi0 * scphi0^3
00246           dg = _e2m * scphi02 * (1 + 2 * Math::sq(tphi0)) + _e2,
00247           D = sphi0m * (1 - _e2*(1 + 2*sphi0*(1+sphi0))) / (_e2m * (1+sphi0)),
00248           // dD/dsphi0
00249           dD = -2 * (1 - _e2*Math::sq(sphi0) * (2*sphi0+3)) /
00250                (_e2m * Math::sq(1+sphi0)),
00251           A = -_e2 * Math::sq(sphi0m) * (2+(1+_e2)*sphi0) /
00252               (_e2m*(1-_e2*Math::sq(sphi0))),
00253           B = (sphi0m * _e2m / (1 - _e2*sphi0) *
00254                (atanhxm1(_e2 *
00255                          Math::sq(sphi0m / (1-_e2*sphi0))) - _e2*sphi0m/_e2m)),
00256           // d(A+B)/dsphi0
00257           dAB = (2 * _e2 * (2 - _e2 * (1 + Math::sq(sphi0))) /
00258                  (_e2m * Math::sq(1 - _e2*Math::sq(sphi0)) * scphi02)),
00259           u = sm1 * g - s/_qZ * ( D - g * (A + B) ),
00260           // du/dsphi0
00261           du = sm1 * dg - s/_qZ * (dD - dg * (A + B) - g * dAB),
00262           dtu = -u/du * (scphi0 * scphi02);
00263         tphi0 += dtu;
00264         if (!(abs(dtu) >= stol))
00265           break;
00266       }
00267     }
00268     _txi0 = txif(tphi0); _scxi0 = hyp(_txi0); _sxi0 = _txi0 / _scxi0;
00269     _n0 = tphi0/hyp(tphi0);
00270     _m02 = 1 / (1 + Math::sq(_fm * tphi0));
00271     _nrho0 = polar ? 0 : _a * sqrt(_m02);
00272     _k0 = sqrt(tphi1 == tphi2 ? 1 : C / (_m02 + _n0 * _qZ * _sxi0)) * k1;
00273     _k2 = Math::sq(_k0);
00274     _lat0 = _sign * atan(tphi0)/Math::degree<real>();
00275   }

00278   AlbersEqualArea::CylindricalEqualArea(Constants::WGS84_a<real>(),

00280                                         real(0), real(1), real(0), real(1),

00290   AlbersEqualArea::AzimuthalEqualAreaSouth(Constants::WGS84_a<real>(),
00291                                            Constants::WGS84_r<real>(),
00292                                            real(-1), real(0), real(-1), real(0),

00294 
00295   Math::real AlbersEqualArea::txif(real tphi) const throw() {
00296     // sxi = ( sphi/(1-e2*sphi^2) + atanhee(sphi) ) /
00297     //       ( 1/(1-e2) + atanhee(1) )
00298     //
00299     // txi = ( sphi/(1-e2*sphi^2) + atanhee(sphi) ) /
00300     //       sqrt( ( (1+e2*sphi)*(1-sphi)/( (1-e2*sphi^2) * (1-e2) ) +
00301     //               atanhee((1-sphi)/(1-e2*sphi)) ) *
00302     //             ( (1-e2*sphi)*(1+sphi)/( (1-e2*sphi^2) * (1-e2) ) +
00303     //               atanhee((1+sphi)/(1+e2*sphi)) ) )
00304     //
00305     // subst 1-sphi = cphi^2/(1+sphi)
00306     int s = tphi < 0 ? -1 : 1;  // Enforce odd parity
00307     tphi *= s;
00308     real
00309       cphi2 = 1 / (1 + Math::sq(tphi)),
00310       sphi = tphi * sqrt(cphi2),
00311       es1 = _e2 * sphi,
00312       es2m1 = 1 - es1 * sphi,
00313       sp1 = 1 + sphi,
00314       es1m1 = (1 - es1) * sp1,
00315       es2m1a = _e2m * es2m1,
00316       es1p1 = sp1 / (1 + es1);
00317     return s * ( sphi / es2m1 + atanhee(sphi) ) /
00318       sqrt( ( cphi2 / (es1p1 * es2m1a) + atanhee(cphi2 / es1m1) ) *
00319             ( es1m1 / es2m1a + atanhee(es1p1) ) );
00320   }
00321 
00322   Math::real AlbersEqualArea::tphif(real txi) const throw() {
00323     real
00324       tphi = txi,
00325       stol = tol_ * max(real(1), abs(txi));
00326     // CHECK: min iterations = 1, max iterations = 2; mean = 1.99
00327     for (int i = 0; i < numit_; ++i) {
00328       // dtxi/dtphi = (scxi/scphi)^3 * 2*(1-e^2)/(qZ*(1-e^2*sphi^2)^2)
00329       real
00330         txia = txif(tphi),
00331         tphi2 = Math::sq(tphi),
00332         scphi2 = 1 + tphi2,
00333         scterm = scphi2/(1 + Math::sq(txia)),
00334         dtphi = (txi - txia) * scterm * sqrt(scterm) *
00335         _qx * Math::sq(1 - _e2 * tphi2 / scphi2);
00336       tphi += dtphi;
00337       if (!(abs(dtphi) >= stol))
00338         break;
00339     }
00340     return tphi;
00341   }
00342 
00343   // return atanh(sqrt(x))/sqrt(x) - 1 = y/3 + y^2/5 + y^3/7 + ...
00344   // typical x < e^2 = 2*f
00345   Math::real AlbersEqualArea::atanhxm1(real x) throw() {
00346     real s = 0;
00347     if (abs(x) < real(0.5)) {
00348       real os = -1, y = 1, k = 1;
00349       while (os != s) {
00350         os = s;
00351         y *= x;                 // y = x^n
00352         k += 2;                 // k = 2*n + 1
00353         s += y/k;               // sum( x^n/(2*n + 1) )
00354       }
00355     } else {
00356       real xs = sqrt(abs(x));
00357       s = (x > 0 ? Math::atanh(xs) : atan(xs)) / xs - 1;
00358     }
00359     return s;
00360   }
00361 
00362   // return (Datanhee(1,y) - Datanhee(1,x))/(y-x)
00363   Math::real AlbersEqualArea::DDatanhee(real x, real y) const throw() {
00364     real s = 0;
00365     if (_e2 * (abs(x) + abs(y)) < real(0.5)) {
00366       real os = -1, z = 1, k = 1, t = 0, c = 0, en = 1;
00367       while (os != s) {
00368         os = s;
00369         t = y * t + z; c += t; z *= x;
00370         t = y * t + z; c += t; z *= x;
00371         k += 2; en *= _e2;
00372         // Here en[l] = e2^l, k[l] = 2*l + 1,
00373         // c[l] = sum( x^i * y^j; i >= 0, j >= 0, i+j < 2*l)
00374         s += en * c / k;
00375       }
00376       // Taylor expansion is
00377       // s = sum( c[l] * e2^l / (2*l + 1), l, 1, N)
00378     } else
00379       s = (Datanhee(1, y) - Datanhee(x, y))/(1 - x);
00380     return s;
00381   }
00382 
00383   void AlbersEqualArea::Forward(real lon0, real lat, real lon,
00384                                 real& x, real& y, real& gamma, real& k)
00385     const throw() {
00386     if (lon - lon0 >= 180)
00387       lon -= lon0 + 360;
00388     else if (lon - lon0 < -180)
00389       lon -= lon0 - 360;
00390     else
00391       lon -= lon0;
00392     lat *= _sign;
00393     real
00394       lam = lon * Math::degree<real>(),
00395       phi = lat * Math::degree<real>(),
00396       sphi = sin(phi), cphi = abs(lat) != 90 ? cos(phi) : epsx_,
00397       tphi = sphi/cphi, txi = txif(tphi), sxi = txi/hyp(txi),
00398       dq = _qZ * Dsn(txi, _txi0, sxi, _sxi0) * (txi - _txi0),
00399       drho = - _a * dq / (sqrt(_m02 - _n0 * dq) + _nrho0 / _a),
00400       theta = _k2 * _n0 * lam, stheta = sin(theta), ctheta = cos(theta),
00401       t = _nrho0 + _n0 * drho;
00402     x = t * (_n0 != 0 ? stheta / _n0 : _k2 * lam) / _k0;
00403     y = (_nrho0 *
00404          (_n0 != 0 ?
00405           (ctheta < 0 ? 1 - ctheta : Math::sq(stheta)/(1 + ctheta)) / _n0 :
00406           0)
00407          - drho * ctheta) / _k0;
00408     k = _k0 * (t != 0 ? t * hyp(_fm * tphi) / _a : 1);
00409     y *= _sign;
00410     gamma = _sign * theta / Math::degree<real>();
00411   }
00412 
00413   void AlbersEqualArea::Reverse(real lon0, real x, real y,
00414                                 real& lat, real& lon,
00415                                 real& gamma, real& k)
00416     const throw() {
00417     y *= _sign;
00418     real
00419       nx = _k0 * _n0 * x, ny = _k0 * _n0 * y, y1 =  _nrho0 - ny,
00420       den = Math::hypot(nx, y1) + _nrho0, // 0 implies origin with polar aspect
00421       drho = den != 0 ? (_k0*x*nx - 2*_k0*y*_nrho0 + _k0*y*ny) / den : 0,
00422       // dsxia = scxi0 * dsxi
00423       dsxia = - _scxi0 * (2 * _nrho0 + _n0 * drho) * drho /
00424               (Math::sq(_a) * _qZ),
00425       txi = (_txi0 + dsxia) / sqrt(max(1 - dsxia * (2*_txi0 + dsxia), epsx2_)),
00426       tphi = tphif(txi),
00427       phi = _sign * atan(tphi),
00428       theta = atan2(nx, y1),
00429       lam = _n0 != 0 ? theta / (_k2 * _n0) : x / (y1 * _k0);
00430     gamma = _sign * theta / Math::degree<real>();
00431     lat = phi / Math::degree<real>();
00432     lon = lam / Math::degree<real>();
00433     // Avoid losing a bit of accuracy in lon (assuming lon0 is an integer)
00434     if (lon + lon0 >= 180)
00435       lon += lon0 - 360;
00436     else if (lon + lon0 < -180)
00437       lon += lon0 + 360;
00438     else
00439       lon += lon0;
00440     k = _k0 * (den != 0 ? (_nrho0 + _n0 * drho) * hyp(_fm * tphi) / _a : 1);
00441   }
00442 
00443   void AlbersEqualArea::SetScale(real lat, real k) {
00444     if (!(k > 0))
00445       throw GeographicErr("Scale is not positive");
00446     if (!(abs(lat) < 90))
00447       throw GeographicErr("Latitude for SetScale not in (-90, 90)");
00448     real x, y, gamma, kold;
00449     Forward(0, lat, 0, x, y, gamma, kold);
00450     k /= kold;
00451     _k0 *= k;
00452     _k2 = Math::sq(_k0);
00453   }
00454 
00455 } // namespace GeographicLib
